Right in the middle —
home between Neukölln & Britz

CIVITANO is located where Berlin is currently the most exciting: at the transition from Neukölln to Britz.
Urban, lively, international — but a bit quieter than classic Neukölln hustle.
Perfect for those who have arrived here and are now looking for their own place.

Restaurants, convenience stores, cafés, Playgrounds, parks, daycare — all within walking distance.
The Teltow Canal for an evening walk, Hermannstraße for daily life, Hermannplatz for action:
everything well connected without being in the middle of the chaos.

Top connections — whichever way you travel

  • • A100 parking/green area — 150 m
  • • Teltow Canal — 400 m
  • • S+U Hermannstraße — 650 m
  • • Tempelhofer Feld — 2 km
  • • Hermannplatz — 3 km
  • • Oberbaum Bridge — 5.5 km

In short: Urban enough to live in, quiet enough to feel at home.
